name: Pony Dress Up and Salon Games for Little Girls
name_original: Pony Dress Up and Salon Games for Little Girls
description:
The Little Princess Pony Dress up 2
Tons of FREE bonus fashion items included!

Features:
- 10 Characters
- 10 Ankle
- 10 Dresses
- 12 Hairs
- 14 Neck Accessories
- 13 Head Accessories
- 9 Tail
- 10 Shoes
- 11 backgrounds
- that's over 4,500,000 combinations!
- Hours of entertainment

Don’t forget to give us a good rating in the App Store!
